thread.title: Modcloth’s affordable wedding dresses are beyond gorgeous, so we picked 21 of our fave gowns
thread.title_full: Modcloth’s affordable wedding dresses are beyond gorgeous, so we picked 21 of our fave gowns

author: Lourdes Avila Uribe
title: Modcloth’s affordable wedding dresses are beyond gorgeous, so we picked 21 of our fave gowns
text:
Modcloth’s affordable wedding dresses are beyond gorgeous, so we picked 21 of our fave gowns One of the best things about being a modern bride is being able to customize your wedding details so that they perfectly reflect your (and your partner’s) taste. This includes the wedding dress, should you choose to wear one! Thank goodness for our dear Modcloth, their affordable bridal collection has just about every style of dress you could imagine , making it possible for you to get your dream dress without breaking the bank or feeling like you compromised your style.
Gone are the days of feeling restricted to puffy ball gowns or stuffy necklines (unless that’s your jam!) You can and should flaunt your own unique style on your big day .
The look of love. Congrats, @taraleeallison! 
A post shared by ModCloth (@modcloth) on Feb 18, 2017 at 9:25am PST 
Whether you prefer long, flowy, lace gowns or you want a short, mod sheath — Modcloth has it all!
Here’s a look at 21 of our favorite Modcloth wedding dresses, you’ll be sure to find just the right one to fit your needs! 1. Aisle Be Watching You A-Line Dress , $150. Modcloth The off the shoulder neckline is right on trend and just couldn’t be sweeter.
2. Destination Dreaming Midi Dress , $200. Modcloth The paisley embroidery and lace cutouts make this simple dress feminine and special.
3. Intricate Observance Maxi Dress , $175. Modcloth Absolutely perfect for the free-spirited, boho bride.
4. Eye-Catching Abundance Maxi Skirt , $199. Modcloth Who says it all needs to be a white dress? This is a chic and subtle way to infuse color and separates into your bridal look.
5. Sunlit Ceremony A-line Dress , $175. Modcloth Can’t you just picture this cheeky number for a classy courthouse wedding?
6. Dignified Delivery Shirt Dress , $26.99 to $89.99. Modcloth This is a seriously elevated shirt dress, and that bow and the pattern on the fabric are absolutely adorable!
7. Simply Stunning Maxi Dress , $124.99. Modcloth This elegant number has gorgeous shoulder detailing that makes it a truly unique bridal look.
8. Ritzy Wishes Sheath Dress , $44.99. Modcloth Doesn’t this dress look like it came straight from the ’60s?
9. Where There’s Life, There’s Elope Maxi Dress , $52.99. Modcloth A classic gown for a very reasonable price, and get a load of the details in the pattern!
10. The Exchanging of Wows Maxi Dress , $89.99 Modcloth If you can’t get enough of that high-low style, this is the dress for you!
11. Sophisticated Ceremony Maxi Dress , $200. Modcloth We love these lacy sleeves; don’t you think the dress is beyond elegant?

12. Memorable Matrimony Maxi Dress , $74.99 to $250. Modcloth This beautiful, floor-length dress manages to look fancy without being stuffy.
13. Heiress of Them All Maxi Dress , $400. Modcloth This lovely lavender ensemble makes for an untraditional, yet classic bride. Don’t you love the detailing in the skirt?
14. A Gliding Light Maxi Dress , $179.99. Modcloth The pale gray pattern gives this dress dimension and personality!
15. Sparkling Celebration Midi Dress , $200. Modcloth The scalloped edge goes perfectly with the mid-calf length!
16. Flowing to the Chapel Lace Dress , $34.99. Modcloth A truly stunning bohemian look!
17. Aisle Be there Fit and Flare Dress , $87.99 Modcloth You’ll feel like Marilyn Monroe in this retro-inspired beauty!
18. Harmonious Ceremony Maxi Dress , $175. Modcloth For the ultimate cool-girl bride!
19. A Matter of Magnificence , $300. Modcloth The pink florals make this dress unique while the traditional A-line shape keeps the vibe bridal!
20. Graceful Grandeur Maxi Dress , $300. Modcloth The beading on this lovely dress gives it an elegant, ’20s-inspired feel.
21. Flawless in Fleurs Midi Dress, $150. Modcloth For the sunny hippie bride, this dress is positively cheerful!
It’s so uplifting to know that no matter what your style or price point, you can absolutely find the right dress for you. You shouldn’t have to compromise your style or comfort to please others or because you’re on a limited budget! Modcloth is committed to having inclusive sizing and a beautiful range ofaccessiblee styles — and for that reason, they have our loyalty for life!
